/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the cityscape. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, contributing to the dynamic atmosphere of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be spotted, adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle.
